meanings.sent1: She blenches when startled by loud noises.
meanings.sent2: The cat blenches at the sudden movement.
meanings.sent3: He always blenches comically when surprised.
meanings.sent4: The idea of public speaking makes her blenches.
meanings.sent5: The child blenches away from the unfamiliar dog.

meanings.sent1: The horse blenches at the sight of the snake.
meanings.sent2: The soldier blenches from the enemy's attack.
meanings.sent3: The chef blenches in mock horror at the burnt dish.
meanings.sent4: Her heart blenches at the thought of losing him.
meanings.sent5: The driver blenches as the car swerves unexpectedly.

meanings.sent1: He blenches before making a decision.
meanings.sent2: She blenches at the idea of change.
meanings.sent3: The student blenches before raising a question.
meanings.sent4: His mind blenches at the risky proposition.
meanings.sent5: The team blenches at the thought of defeat.
